CustomField.description: If Salesforce is selected, a Salesforce welcome email will be sent to the user & cc'ing the CDMT team for setup in SAP. If Salesforce Non Seller selected, an email will be sent to the user without cc the CDMT.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Salesforce is selected, a Salesforce welcome email will be sent to the user & cc'ing the CDMT team for setup in SAP. If Salesforce Non Seller selected, an email will be sent to the user without cc the CDMT.
CustomField.label: AutoEmail
